=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2013/05/04
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jeff Kurr', 'Nick Stringer', 'Tony Sacco', 'Brian Armstrong', 'Paul Matusheski', 'Gareth Johnson', 'Kevin Bachar', 'Nick Caloyianis', 'Scott Gurney', 'Robert Nixon'], 'Studio': ['Discovery Channel']}
Review Text: I love the shark weeks, sitting enthralled as the sharks are explained in layman's terms  that most anyone could understand. These are not mindless eating machines! Shark week shows us the top super predators of the oceans and why they react the way they do! This set shows that our thinking has been skewed by movies like JAWS and our fears. These people go in to their worlds and show us another side of these animals that are just amazing! Please keep up the good work!
Review Title: Lots of information!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: My family and I have enjoyed watching this. I would mot recomend it for younger families, there are gorey parts that might give little ones nightmares! But for a family with older teens, hang up everything you knew about grimms fairy tales! Enjoy The Newest Grimm as he finds himself pulled in to a new world, that has always been there!

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The analyzed shopping behavior indicates a strong inclination towards family-friendly entertainment, particularly classic shows and films that evoke nostalgia. The individual consistently rates products highly, with a predominant sentiment of love for childhood favorites, as evidenced by their appreciation of iconic series and movies that exhibit positive family dynamics and engaging storytelling.

Key themes suggest a preference for content that is rich in character development, relatable narratives, and captivating subject matter, notably in genres such as science fiction and nature documentaries. The person enjoys immersive, informative experiences that challenge misconceptions—evident in their enthusiasm for educational content about sharks, highlighting a pursuit of knowledge alongside entertainment.

Quality plays a crucial role, as indicated by consistently high ratings across purchases, reflecting a discerning taste for well-produced material. This preference is coupled with a noticeable sensitivity to content appropriateness, favoring selections that are suitable for older children and families.

In terms of price sensitivity, while no explicit monetary trends are disclosed, the willingness to engage with renowned directors and producers suggests a readiness to invest in high-quality content. Overall, core preferences encapsulate a love for nostalgic, family-oriented entertainment that is both engaging and educational, with a clear emphasis on quality storytelling and production standards.

target_interaction.title: Five Stars
target_interaction.text: This is a very real and eye opening movie of what is happening to our children.
